description:
Protect and discover secrets using Gitleaks

Gitleaks is a SAST tool for detecting and preventing hardcoded secrets like passwords, api keys,
and tokens in git repos. Gitleaks is an easy-to-use, all-in-one solution for detecting secrets,
past or present, in your code.
Changelog
- cf5334f feat: add curl basic auth rule (#1575)
- d07b394 Update spelling in README.md (#1574)
- 5c03fa4 refactor(allowlist): use iota for condition (#1569)
- 12034a7 refactor(config): temporarily switch to [rules.allowlist] (#1573)
